comparison.title: Comparing Traditional Gynecomastia Surgery & Latest Surgical Techniques

definition.title: What is Gynecomastia?
definition.content: Gynecomastia is the enlargement of male breast tissue, which can lead to swelling, tenderness, and embarrassment. It can affect one or both breasts, and can result from hormonal imbalances, obesity, or the use of certain medications. Surgical treatment of gynecomastia involves removing excess breast tissue and restoring the chest to a more natural appearance.

treatment.title: Treatment Options
treatment.content: Treatment options for gynecomastia include medication, lifestyle changes, and surgical intervention. The best treatment for gynecomastia depends on the severity of the condition, the cause, and the patient's preferences.

prevention.title: Prevention
listItems: Avoiding steroids and drugs causing gynecomastia
